Congratulations! Thank you for playing.

      
vast was made for #KAJAM2021. It was built using
        the Kaboom game library.

      
The source code for this game can be found on Github.

    

    

      
vast was made by Joe Alves.
        


      
All sprite and sound assets from itch.io artists:
      

      

      
    
        
  • Player sprite: Pixel Prototype
            Player by Dead Revolver
    • 
        
  • Terminal, Boss ("Abel") sprites: the amazing Penusbmic
    • 
        
  • Drone: "Dangerous Path" by joshuuu
        
    • 
        
  • Level 7 and End Level music: Makoto

        the Kaboom game library.

    w/a/s/d: move
    space: jump
    e: use/go through door
    

    Game screen is 1200x700
    Load reached levels from title screen
